Package org.jboss.elemento

Class ElementBuilder<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,​B extends ElementBuilder<E,​B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.elemento.ElementBuilder<E,​B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsElement<E>, TypedBuilder<E,​B>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyContentBuilder, HtmlContentBuilder, InputBuilder, TextContentBuilder
    public abstract class ElementBuilder<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,​B extends ElementBuilder<E,​B>>
extends Object
implements TypedBuilder<E,​B>, IsElement<E>
    Base builder with methods common to all typed builders.

        public B data​(String name,
              String value)
        Adds a data- attribute to the element.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data attribute w/o the data- prefix. However it won't be added if it's already present.
